youtube.title: Why Do Forehead Veins Pulse? The Heart's Secret Signal Explained
youtube.description: Explore the fascinating biology behind visible pulsing veins in the forehead. Learn how this vascular phenomenon relates to heart health and blood pressure. Discover the science they don't teach you in school with this quick medical breakdown.
